mapper.select: select userlisttype from userlist, userlist_has_user where userlist.ownerid = #{myid} and userlist.userlistid = userlist_has_user.userlistid and userlist_has_user.userid = #{userid} and userlist.userlisttype <> 601 and userlist.userlisttype <> 603
select userid,username,useravatar from user where userid in (select userid from userlist_has_user where userlistid = #{userlistid})

select userid,username,useravatar from user where userid in (select ownerid from userlist where userlisttype = #{type} and userlistid in (select userlistid from userlist_has_user where userid = #{userid}))
select count(*) from userlist where userlisttype = #{type} and userlistid in (select userlistid from userlist_has_user where userid = #{userid})

select articleid,title,content,authorid,useravatar from article,user where article.articletype = #{type} and article.authorid = user.userid and article.articleid in (select articleid from bookmark_has_article where bookmarkid in (select bookmarkid from bookmark where ownerid = #{userid}))
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark_has_article where articleid = #{articleid} and bookmarkid in (select bookmarkid from bookmark where ownerid = #{userid})
